title: I have a Google Pixel 2 xl device a year ago and I have a lot of problems with it!!!! Pl help!!!
content:
I have a Google Pixel  2 xl device a year ago and I have a lot of problems with it and I can not communicate with Google and I do not know what to do. Is there Someone here that can help me here? 
For example, I put every load of Google possible to recharge the phone and the cellphone is not loaded but at least other chargers is yes, but it also turns off at the beginning and I have to activate it and every time it happens to me really not suitable for Google!
